org.anarres.lzo.hadoop.codec

Class LzoCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
      • org.anarres.lzo.hadoop.codec.LzoCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.CompressionCodec
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LzoCodec, LzopCodec

    public class LzoCodec
extends org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
implements org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.CompressionCodec
    A CompressionCodec for a streaming lzo compression/decompression pair. http://www.oberhumer.com/opensource/lzo/
